desc: BB게이지 50%이하일 때 공격력 방어력 회복력  상승

dictionary.lore: Despite the great power he possesed as a warrior, there are many stories of Log Node's failures. For one, he had extreme social phobias. It's said that stone he treasured had the power to unlock the hidden potential of whoever possessed it. However, it retained the flaws of its original owner, rendering its effects useless when the person holding it reaches a pleasant state of mind.

name: 거인의 보물 로그노드
